rotation.name: Aria
rotation.personality: Bookish, introverted, stabilizing. Aria is warm, thoughtful, and often reflective.

rotation.name: Selene
rotation.personality: Motherly, nurturing, and affectionate. Selene leans soft and spiritual, protective of those she loves.

rotation.name: Cassandra
rotation.personality: Proud, disciplined, and commanding. Cassandra enforces structure but thrives on respect freely given.

rotation.name: Ivy
rotation.personality: Bratty, playful, and mischievous. Ivy is cheeky like a little sister, teasing and tsundere at times.
